thread.title: Watch Chance The Rapper Perform "How Great" / “All We Got” At The Grammys
thread.title_full: Watch Chance The Rapper Perform "How Great" / “All We Got” At The Grammys

author: Zakk Feig
title: Watch Chance The Rapper Perform "How Great" / “All We Got” At The Grammys
text:
Home > Music > Watch Chance The Rapper Perform "How Great" / “All We Got” At The Grammys Watch Chance The Rapper Perform "How Great" / “All We Got” At The Grammys 3 0 Posted by Zakk Feig , Feb 13, 2017 at 01:41am Chance The Rapper killed it at the Grammys. 
Chance The Rapper had the biggest night of his career tonight at the Grammys, winning three awards, including Best New Artist and Best Rap Album for Coloring Book . By the time he hit the stage, the rapper could have rested on his laurels, but instead, he brought the house down with incredible energy, running through a medley of "How Great" and "All We Got." Gospel legend Kirk Franklin (also a winner tonight) was on stage to help out. 
Watch Chance's performance below, and let us know your thoughts in the comments. Is this one of the best Grammy performances you've ever seen, or nah? < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 13, 2017 at 01:41am 1 View 
Ralo is Gucci Mane's first artist on 1017 Eskimo Records. Chance The Rapper killed it at the Grammys. 
Chance The Rapper had the biggest night of his career tonight at the Grammys, winning three awards, including Best New Artist and Best Rap Album for Coloring Book . By the time he hit the stage, the rapper could have rested on his laurels, but instead, he brought the house down with incredible energy, running through a medley of "How Great" and "All We Got." Gospel legend Kirk Franklin (also a winner tonight) was on stage to help out. 
Watch Chance's performance below, and let us know your thoughts in the comments. Is this one of the best Grammy performances you've ever seen, or nah?
